The Platform supports 12 languages, is compliant to the SCORM 1.2 standard, and can support different didactic models. Including: Blended, Self-Directed, Collaborative and even Social Learning through Chat, Wiki, Forums and 53 other different functions.

To change this words please go on Admin/Language management, search for LMS/login and edit the key _INTRO_STD_TEXT
